DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the dose of drug which is most effective in the delineation of dead heart muscle.
DOC.brief_title: Depiction of Delayed Enhancement in Patients With Documented Myocardial Infarction
DOC.detailed_description: This study has previously been posted by Berlex, Inc. Berlex, Inc. has been renamed to Bayer HealthCare Pharmaceuticals, Inc.Bayer HealthCare Pharmaceuticals, Inc.is the sponsor of the trial.
DOC.criteria: At least 8 weeks postdocumented myocardial infarction (heart attack) History of radiation therapy to the chest Clinically unstable Any contraindication for MRI
